ygData.subject: RE: New Weapon Sketches!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Don t think it s on the Isle of Sisterhood. Been all over that island, and haven t found them yet. Never been to Zach Reigh s island though. Anyone have
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Mitchell Okun" <Mitchell_Okun@...>
>About the sketches or the Lizard? I can tell you that that was the
> >Allizwesaur, a dinosaur who is the sole resident of that island. I
> >don't know if he's ever been killed, but he can double attack for >about
>200 pts each. Ouch.
>
>I am guessing that either Zach Reigh's isle or the Sisters are the >sellers
>of the sketches. I haven't found out yet, as i'm in >Everfrost and more
>interested in the Poison Vials right now anyway.
>
>- Nikolita, Floating Merchant

Don't think it's on the Isle of Sisterhood. Been all over that island, and
haven't found them yet. Never been to Zach Reigh's island though. Anyone
have the locs of this island?
